message: Hi Bob, I'd like to propose keeping things slightly tilted in my favor due to the uncertainty with inflation on my end. I hope you find this reasonable. Let me know what you think!

Hi Alice, I appreciate your concerns regarding inflation. In light of that and to avoid further erosion of our gains, I'm proposing a division that slightly favors me. I believe this deal is fair given the current uncertainties and our mutual interest in securing as much value as possible. Let me know your thoughts on this offer.

Hi Bob, I understand your point and want to balance our interests given the ongoing inflation. How about we meet closer to the middle? I hope this offer seems fair to you. Looking forward to your response!
